body.p:
The XProc tab contains the following options:
XProc URL Specify the source XSL file to be used by the transformation. This URL is resolved through the catalog resolver. If the catalog does not have a mapping for the URL, the file is used directly from its remote location.
Processor Allows you to select the XProc engine to be used for the transformation. You can select the Add-on for Calabash XProc engine or a custom engine that is configured in the XProc Preferences page.
